text: Jon Heidenreich, also known simply by his ring name Heidenreich, is an American former professional wrestler and American football player. He is best known for his time with World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) on their SmackDown brand. He is a former WWE Tag Team Champion with Road Warrior Animal as a part of the LOD 2005. Prior to his professional wrestling, Heidenreich played American football. He played in the Canadian Football League for the Shreveport Pirates. He also played for the Frankfurt Galaxy of NFL Europa in 1997. == Championships == * 302 Wrestling ** 302 Heavyweight Championship (1 time) * All American Wrestling (Louisiana) ** AAW Heavyweight Championship (1 time) ** AAW Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Rodney Mack * American Wrestling Rampage ** AWR No Limits Championship (1 time) * Bluegrass Championship Wrestling ** BCW World Heavyweight Championship (1 time) * No Limit Wrestling ** NLW Heavyweight Championship (1 time) * Over The Top Wrestling ** OTT No Limits Championship (1 time) * Pro Wrestling ZERO1-MAX ** NWA Intercontinental Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Nathan Jones * Texas Wrestling Alliance ** TWA Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Busta * World Wrestling Council ** WWC Universal Heavyweight Championship (2 times) * World Wrestling Entertainment ** WWE Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Road Warrior Animal ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American professional wrestlers Category:American football players Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from New Orleans
title: Jon Heidenreich
